comment._content:
That's the Palace Theatre on Lake Street. 
The movie 'My american wife' with Gloria Swanson was released in 1922.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/52847614@N05]  Thanks for that information. We'll need to amend the date on this image and also can now place it more accurately on the map. Thanks!

comment.author: 87970399@N03
comment._content: Certainly is the Palace Theatre, although the date is October 1937. I looked twice at this photo because it just didn't feel 1915 or 1922.
